subject: Question about Assignment 2
body: Hi Professor, I'm having trouble with the responsive design part of the portfolio website. Could you provide a hint?

subject: Re: Question about Assignment 2
body: Of course. Take a look at the CSS Flexbox resources I posted in the course materials. That should point you in the right direction.

subject: Database Project - Team Formation
body: Hey Sara, do you want to team up for the Database Design Project?

subject: Re: Database Project - Team Formation
body: Yeah, that sounds great! Let's connect after class tomorrow to discuss ideas.

subject: Office Hours Request
body: Professor Chapman, would it be possible to schedule a brief meeting to go over my feedback on the Linked List assignment? Thanks, David.

subject: Question about ML Assignment
body: Hi Professor, for the spam classifier, are we allowed to use libraries like scikit-learn, or should we implement Naive Bayes from scratch? Thanks, Noah.

subject: Re: Question about ML Assignment
body: Hi Noah, you are encouraged to use libraries like scikit-learn for this assignment. The focus is on understanding and applying the model correctly. Good question!

subject: OS Project Partner
body: Hey Liam, want to partner up for the Process Scheduler Simulation project?

subject: Re: OS Project Partner
body: Definitely! I was just about to ask you. Let's sync up this week.

subject: Help with Packet Sniffer
body: Professor, my packet sniffer isn't capturing any packets. I've installed Scapy and am running the script with sudo. Any ideas? - Benjamin
